title: Zhane9's Art
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:turbo-vision]]
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

Been an SCP fan for as long as I can remember but I've never contributed due to my stupid brain being filled with excessive paranoia and stress, but that all changes --today-- (a while ago actually). I hope you enjoy my drawings, even through I'm not the best I had fun making them and I think they turned out alright. 

[[collapsible show="I was there to witness"]] 
[[image Victim.png]]
 
The Victim of a sickness. 
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="7000"]] 
[[image 7000-1.png]]
 
From where you're kneeling it must seem like an 18-carat run of bad luck. 
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="8048"]] 
[[image 8048.png]]
 
Made with blood, sweat, and tears. 
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="8593"]] 
[[image 8593.png]]
 
I get no appreciation. 
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="3300"]] 
[[image 3300.png]]

There will come soft rain. 
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="173"]] 
[[image SCP173.png]]
 
Guess who's back.
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="1788"]] 
[[image ADults2.png]]

We're the adults here.
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="Dafydd Utica Foolfellow's Proposal"]] 
[[image WEASELS.png]]

Strange creatures, the only word I can think of to describe them is [WEASEL!?!?!]
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="Dark Sushi"]] 
[[image DarkSushi.png]]

Some people have no respect for the arts
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="Daevites"]] 
[[image DaeviteMatriarch.png]]

Image appears to show a Matriarch, though nothing is ever certain with this civilization.  
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="SPC"]] 
[[image SharkPuncher.png]]

Justice is a dish best served with the wind in your hair and toes in the sand.
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="096"]] 
[[image 096.png]]

Made ya look!
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="Dr. Wondertainment"]] 
[[image Wondertainment.png]]

Do you believe in magic?
[[/collapsible]]

[[collapsible show="The Chicago Spirit"]] 
[[image ChicagoS[pirit.png]]

Two faced criminal.
[[/collapsible]]

Thank you :)

(Theme by JakDragonX and Croquembouche)
author: ZhaneNine
